author: Nigel Thompson
title: Vote in the British Travel Awards and win a Barcelona break or free airport hotel and parking
text:
Tuck into tapas in Spain or pick up UK airport hotel parking stays with the latest travel “Oscars” prizes.
Public participation in the bench­­mark British Travel Awards – which are backed by the Daily Mirror – is now open to September 30 and already we’ve had a massive 323,000 votes.
Everyone who casts a vote for the prestigious awards is entered into a draw for an Aladdin’s cave of amazing holiday prizes worth more than £30,000.
You could bag a two night Barcelona break worth £500 courtesy of leading midscale hotel brand Novotel .
It’s for two people and includes breakfast and return flights, with accommodation in one of Novotel’s central Barcelona hotels.
Or you could also win one of 25 family hotel and parking packages with Airport Parking & Hotels (APH.com). The prize is a stay at a UK airport hotel for one night (for up to a family of four) and up to one week’s airport parking for one car.
That giveaway could be worth up to £149 if you stayed at the Sheraton Skyline at Heathrow, for example.
And as a bonus to thank you for voting and taking part in the consumer survey for this year’s travel awards, APH is also offering 15% off selected airport parking and airport hotel and parking packages.
How it works The voting is all online at britishtravelawards.com and the ballot is scrutinised by leading accountants Deloitte.
Anyone can vote – you do not need to have UK address.
The awards have more than 70 awards categories but you do not have to vote in them all – just opt for as many or as few as you wish.
If you only want to vote once for the Best Hotel Booking Website, that’s fine.
The online voting form also allows you to return to it as many times as you like up to September 30 to alter your votes or add new ones.
You’ll also get an invite to join in a survey that looks at the nation’s travel plans for 2016.
It’s entirely voluntary and, like the awards voting, you can do as much or as little as you wish.
As a thank you for taking part in the survey, you’ll get a bonus entry in the holiday prize draw!
The 2015 travel “Oscars” winners will be announced on November 25.
Full terms and conditions and vote form at britishtravelawards.com DailyMirror
